Class SimpleSolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.SimpleSolution

  • public class SimpleSolution
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines solutions for SimpleParityGame.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
